articles.title: Disney's (DIS) Shares Falter as Avatar Movie Misses Estimates
articles.content: Disney's (DIS) latest movie Avatar: The Way of Water grosses $134 million on the opening weekend at the domestic box office, missing expectations of more than $175 million.

articles.title: Tesla To $285? Here Are 10 Other Price Target Changes For Tuesday
articles.content:
Wells Fargo raised  Ross Stores, Inc.  (NASDAQ: ROST) price  target from $120 to $135. Wells Fargo analyst Ike Boruchow maintained an Overweight rating on the stock. Ross Stores shares fell 0.9% to close at $114.92 on Friday.
Deutsche Bank cut  Allegiant Travel Company  (NASDAQ: ALGT) price target from $106 to $75. Deutsche Bank analyst Michael Linenberg downgraded the stock from Buy to Hold. Allegiant Travel fell 0.9% to $66.45 in pre-market trading.
BMO Capital raised the price target on  Beam Therapeutics Inc.  (NASDAQ: BEAM) from $61 to $66. BMO Capital analyst Kostas Biliouris upgraded the stock from Market Perform to Outperform. Beam Therapeutics shares gained 2.2% to $41.00 in pre-market trading.
